SA15n1238:9: iha yadvastuno bhedābhedābhyāmabhidheyaṃ na bhavati tadvastu na bhavati |
SA15n1238:14: na hi vyaktibhyo bhinnamabhinnaṃ vā sāmānyaṃ śakyamabhidhātum |
SA15n1238:16: tathā hi yadi tāvadvyaktibhyo'rthāntarameva sāmānyābhimataṃ vastu tadā kathaṃ tattāsāṃ sāmānyaṃ nāma |
SA15n1238:17: yat khalu yato'rthāntaraṃ na tattasya sāmānyam |
SA15n1238:21: nanu ca vyaktibhyo'rthāntaraṃ ca syāt sāmānyaṃ ca tāsāmiti |
SA15n1238:24: arthāntaraṃ cedarthāntarasya sāmānyaṃ sarvaṃ sarvasya sāmānyaṃ syādviśeṣābhāvāditi |
SA15n1238:25: yaddhi khalvekaṃ vastvanekatra samavetaṃ tattadīyaṃ sāmānyam |
SA15n1238:26: goṣu cāśvo na samaveta iti kathamasau gavāṃ sāmānyaṃ syāditi kuto viśeṣābhāvaḥ |
SA15n1238:29: sa hi viśeṣo buddhimatā vaktavyo yaḥ sāmānyābhimatapadārthamātrabhāvī sannasaṃkareṇa vyavasthāmupapādayet |
SA15n1238:30: ayaṃ cānekārthasamavāyaḥ saṃkhyāsaṃyogakāyadravyādiṣvapyastīti tānyapi sāṃkhyādisaṃmatāni sāmānyāni syuḥ |
SA15n1238:32: satyapyanekārthasamavāye yadeva samānajñānābhidhānapravṛttinimittaṃ tadeva sāmānyaṃ nānyat |
SA15n1238:42: tatra yadi te svata eva samānāḥ saṃmāne jñānābhidhāna .....( )
SA15n1238:48: na tarhiī teṣāṃ sāmānyamasti samānānāṃ bhāvaḥ sāmānyamityuktavānasi |
SA15n1238:49: asamānāṃ ca bhāvaḥ sāmānyamiti bruvāṇaḥ ślāghanīyaprajño devānāṃpriyaḥ |
SA15n1238:50: svayamasamānasvabhāvā api te naiva samānāsta iti cet |
SA15n1238:57: nanu yaiṣāṃ niṣpannatayā kṛñaḥ karmatā nāsti kathaṃ te kriyante nāma |
SA15n1238:58: syādetat, yena dharmirūpeṇa te niṣpannā na tena karoteḥ karmabhāvamanubhavanti |
SA15n1238:59: samānena punā rūpeṇa [ 3 a ] niṣpannāstena kriyanta iti na kiṃcidatrānupapannam |
SA15n1238:60: evaṃ tarhi tadeva samānaṃ rūpaṃ sāmānyena kiyata iti syāt tasya ca bhāvaniṣpattāvaniṣpannasya kāraṇāntarataḥ paśvādupajāyamānasya tadbhāvatā brahmaṇāpyaśaktā sādhayitum |
SA15n1238:64: tathā ca tadapi bhedānāmasamānānāṃ kathaṃ sāmānyamiti paryanuyoge tenāpi tadvyatiriktasamānarūpakaraṇopagame satyaparāparakarmasāmānyaparikalpanātmakamanavasthānamapratividhānamāsajyate na ca bhedānāmasamānarūpaṃ pracyavate |
SA15n1238:66: na hyanyenānye samānā nāma pratīyante tadvanto nāma pratīyeran |
SA15n1238:68: anyathā hi yena kenacidapyanyena ye kecana samānāḥ pratīyeran pratiniyamanibandhanābhāvāt |
SA15n1238:73: atha teṣāṃ svāśrayeṣu samānajñānābhidhānasāmarthyābhāvādadoṣa eṣaḥ nanu sāmānyamapi bhedeṣvekatvānekasamavāyābhyāmeva samapratyayahetutayā parikalpitam |
SA15n1238:74: tau vā'vayavyādīnāmapi yuṣmābhirabhyupetāviti teṣāmapi tathābhāvaḥ kathamapākiyeta |
SA15n1238:78: tathā hyekatvādeḥ samānatvātsāmānyābhimatabhāvavadārabhya dravyāderapi kiṃ na sāmānyarūpateti paryanuyoge samānapratyayāpratyayatvādityuttaramuktavānasi |
SA15n1238:79: tatastadapi samānapratītinimittasya samānatvātsamānamavayavyāderapi kiṃ na syādityasmadīye punaḥ paryanuyoge sanyasāmānyarūpatvāditi bruvāṇaḥ ............ ( )
SA15n1238:81: tasya ca sākṣādekatvanityatve pratijñāya punarupadeśāntareṇa tata eva prativahatīti kathaṃ nonmataḥ |
SA15n1238:85: yadyapi hi sāmānyaṃ bhedābhedābhyāṃ kevalābhyāṃ vācyaṃ na tathāpyavastu prakārāntarasyāpyubhayātmanā lakṣaṇasya saṃbhavādbhinnābhinnameva hi sāmānyaṃ jainajaiminīyāḥ pratijānate || yadāhuḥ ||
SA15n1238:101: ataśva vyaktibhyaḥ sāmānyaṃ bhinnamabhinnaṃ ceti bruvāṇo vyaktayaḥ sāmānyaṃ na ca vyaktayaḥ sāmānyamiti brūte |
SA15n1238:104: yadyadevaṃ na tadatadbhavati yathoṣṇaṃ vahrirūpaṃ nānuṣṇam |
SA15n1238:109: anyathā hi pratītiyathānusāriṇā bhavatā dvicandrādayo ... ... ... vaśātte nihnūyansa iti cet |
SA15n1238:111: [ 5 a] na saṃvido yuktibhirasti bādheti cet |
SA15n1238:112: nanu kimiyaṃ rājñāmājñā yenāvicārya gṛhyeta pratyakṣasvabhāvā saṃvit |
SA15n1238:113: tacca jyeṣṭhapramāṇamato na bādhyata iti cet |
SA15n1238:115: lakṣaṇayukte bādhāsaṃbhave tallakṣaṇameva dūṣitaṃ syāditi sarvatrānāśvāsaḥ |
SA15n1238:116: yathānumānābhāso bādhyate pratyakṣābhāso'pi kiṃ na bādhyate |
SA15n1238:118: pratyakṣaiva punariyaṃ saṃvittistatkathaṃ na bādhyata iti cet |
SA15n1238:120: atha pratyakṣameva pratyakṣasya tadābhāsatāṃ bādhyatvātsādhayati na tvanumānamityabhiniveśaḥ |
SA15n1238:121: kathaṃ tarhi jvālādiviṣayāyāḥ pratyabhijñāyā vyaktyapekṣayā pratyakṣābhāsatā vyavasthāpyate |
SA15n1238:125: na śakyaṃ vaktuṃ sāmānyameva kevalaṃ tayā viṣayīkriyata iti tathābhāve hi tadevedaṃ buddhijvālātvamiti syāt na tu saiveyaṃ jvāleti |
